entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Pocatière 6:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
